attributes.action: Clap for all the farmers, truck drivers and supermarket staff who provide food
attributes.additional_details: Farmers, truck drivers and supermarket market workers are the key people who keep food steadily flowing in the uk to keep the public fed and without them we'd have no food and they deserve the recognition they deserve
attributes.background: Get everyone in the uk to clap at 8pm for all the farmers, truck drivers and supermarket staff who provide food for all the British public

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Clap for Carers weekly event is not organised by the UK Government or Parliament.
